H0.text: The Lord Advocate is the chief law officer in which European country. United Kingdom

H1.text: The Lord Advocate is the chief law officer in which European country. Ireland

H2.text: The Lord Advocate is the chief law officer in which European country. Scotland

H3.text: The Lord Advocate is the chief law officer in which European country. H-Alba

A4.text: The Lord Advocate is the principal legal adviser of both the Scottish Government and the Crown in Scotland for civil and criminal matters that fall within the devolved powers of the Scottish Parliament.

A5.text: The Lord Advocate serves as the chief public prosecutor for Scotland with all prosecutions on indictment being conducted by the Crown Office and Procurator Fiscal Service in the Lord Advocate's name on behalf of the Monarch.
